root: ^The email told you to look for a woman wearing a hijab and pink lipstick.

intro_knot_1: ^There, in the corner. She got here before you.
player_goes_forth: ^You walk towards her. She's sipping from a steaming cup. She doesn't see you.
player_hangs_back: ^You hesitate in the doorway. What are you supposed to say?
^"Excuse me." A man brushes past and gets in line for coffee.
^You hear a voice say, "Hey. Hey! Over here."
player_hangs_back_2: ^It's Khadijah. She's waving you over to her table.
unsure_mumbling: ^"I guess it is," you say. A nervous laugh slips out of you.
^She laughs too, a thin, raspy sound.
recognize_Khadijah: ^She smiles, but the smile doesn't reach her eyes.
freeze_up: ^You turn towards the window. Panic bubbles at the back of your throat.
^A hand settles on your shoulder, and you jump.
^"Are you okay?" says a voice. You turn. It's Khadijah. It must be.
^"I'm sorry," you say. "I don't know what came over me. I just-"
^"It's fine. It's probably a lot, meeting me," she says.
walk_to_table: ^"I was afraid it wasn't actually you," Khadijah says. She laughs, but it sounds forced.
^"I was afraid of the same thing," you tell her.
go_get_drink: ^"I already got something to drink," Khadijah says. "Want to go get something? I'll wait here and make sure no one takes the table."
^"I'm fine, thanks. I don't think I could manage to eat anything right now."
player_orders_something: ^You pick your nails while waiting in line. Everyone else is acting so normally. But then, how could they know why you're here?
order_cappuccino: ^The barista hands you a cup. It's so hot you nearly yelp, but when you sip, the bitter taste of the coffee braces you.
^You make your way back to the table.
order_peppermint_tea: ^The barista hands you a cup. It's so hot you nearly yelp, but when you sip, the herbal taste of the tea centers you.
^You make your way back to the table.
order_cookie: ^The woman at the counter hands you a chocolate-chip cookie. You take a small bite and focus on the sweetness to calm your nerves.
^You make your way back to the table.
intro_describe_assault: ^"I guess this is the part where we talk about what happened to us," says Khadijah. "Right?"
